survey_name: Digital Wallet Usage and Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather insights on user satisfaction and usage patterns of digital wallet services to help improve features and user experience.

questions.question_text: Which digital wallet service do you primarily use?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Ensure 'Other' option includes a text field for specification.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice dropdown with an optional text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which digital wallet service do you primarily use?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: How often do you use your digital wallet service?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected a digital wallet service in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a clear frequency scale to gauge usage habits.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How often do you use your digital wallet service?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected a digital wallet service in Q1.

questions.question_text: What features do you value the most in your digital wallet service? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who use a digital wallet service at least 'Rarely' in Q2.
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to understand prioritized features.

script.question_text: What features do you value the most in your digital wallet service? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who use a digital wallet service at least 'Rarely' in Q2.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your digital wallet service overall?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who use a digital wallet service at least 'Rarely' in Q2.
questions.client_notes: Use a standard satisfaction scale for consistency.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your digital wallet service overall?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who use a digital wallet service at least 'Rarely' in Q2.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your digital wallet service?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied' in Q4.
questions.client_notes: Provide an open-ended text box for detailed feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text area for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your digital wallet service?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied' in Q4.
